name: Forgetful Friends
description:
Forgetful Friends is a an improv card game about catching up with your friends at your high school reunion. Everyone gets a random persona, consisting of a adjective, job, and quirk, and players have to figure out each other's personas based off their acting.

I worked on a team of three students to create this game for our Intro to Narrative Design class. I served as a designer, along with creating the art assets for the cards using Photoshop and the Rule sheet using InDesign.
